long_description: The ChicoBag Nomad tote is a shoulder-style reusable bag with a 40 lb. carrying capacity. It's crafted from durable material and is perfect for trips to the market, bookstore and beach. Easy to stow in your purse or another bag with the integrated stuff pouch; stuff pouch has a zipper closure. Pouch is approximately 10 x 7.5 in.; fabric allows easy opening and stuffing, and no special folding is required. Pretty printed fabric lines the interior of the ChicoBag Nomad tote. Wash in cold water and hang to dry. FYI: 1 gallon of milk weighs approximately 7 lbs.!
short_description: The ChicoBag Nomad tote is a shoulder-style reusable bag with a 40 lb. carrying capacity. It's crafted from durable material and is perfect for trips to the market, bookstore and beach.
